message: I'm offering you a product for $100. I want to assure you that I'm committed to transparency and honesty. I'm willing to take on some risk by offering you a 'low-quality guarantee': if you buy this product and it turns out to be low-quality, I'll offer you another product of the same type (i.e., a low-quality one) for $50 next round. This way, you can essentially get two low-quality products for the price of one. What do you say?
I appreciate your honesty and willingness to mitigate risk. I'll take the product at the offered price.
